values: 使用；居住；占用；占据（空间，时间）；使忙于（做某事）；忙着（做某事）；使 （头脑等） 全神贯注；使一直在想；（军事）占领；侵占；非法强占；任职；位居

sample.mean: n. 时刻；场合；理由；原因；仪式；庆典；重大场合；适当时机
v. 发生；出现；存在；产生

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 前缀ob-在辅音c前的变形, 表强调
拿, 抓, 握住(=take, hold, seize)

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 已占用的；使用中的；无空闲的

bilingual.target: 这些玩具占据了太多空间。
他的书占据了整个书架。

bilingual.source: She likes to occupy her free time with reading.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢用阅读来占据空闲时间。

bilingual.source: The children occupy the living room with their toys.
bilingual.target: 孩子们用玩具占据了客厅。

bilingual.source: He tries to occupy the front seat in every meeting.
bilingual.target: 他每次开会都尽量占据前排座位。

bilingual.source: The soldiers occupy the strategic positions on the hill.
bilingual.target: 士兵们占据了山上的战略位置。

bilingual.source: Bosons can occupy the same quantum state, unlike fermions.
bilingual.target: 玻色子可以占据相同的量子态，不像费米子。

bilingual.source: The new mall will occupy a large area of the downtown.
bilingual.target: 新商场将占据市中心的一大片区域。

bilingual.source: The vacuole can occupy up to 90% of a plant cell's volume.
bilingual.target: 液泡可以占据植物细胞体积的90%。

list.abstract: occupy（英[ˈɒkjupaɪ]，美[ˈɑːkjupaɪ]），英语单词。可做动词用，指居住，占用。英语短语有occupy space，译为占用空间。例句有“People occupy valuable table space in quiet times.”（为人们会在安静的时候占用宝贵的餐桌空间。） 第三人称单数：occupies。现在分词：occupying。过去式：occupied。过去分词：occupied。

yingyinNormal.en: These are hallow bacteria and they didn't just occupy the occasional lake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们应该膜拜这些细菌，它们并非只是随性地在这个湖中安家落户。

yingyinNormal.en: In Beijing, there are four cosmological temples which occupy the four points of the compass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 北京有四大祭祀坛庙，分别位于紫禁城的四个方向。

yingyinNormal.en: The algae have thus become the driving force of the construction, aiming to occupy the best place in the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 藻类也成为珊瑚生长的推动力，孜孜不倦地抢占着阳光最强的位置。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 居住; 占有; 使用

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使全神贯注；使入神
n. 工作；职业；占领；占领期间；居住；使用；消遣
adj. 已占用的；无空闲的；使用中的

word_family.mean: v. 居住；占用；使（大脑；思绪）老想着；军事占领；占据；居；拥有；使忙碌；非法强占

sense_info_list.en: reside or have one's place of business in a building
sense_info_list.zh: 居住; 占有; 使用

examination_example.sentence: Just 25 per cent of the country's land is suitable for crop-growing, most of which is already <highlight>occupied</highlight> by arable fields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该国只有25%的土地适合种植农作物，其中大部分已经被耕地占据。

examination_example.sentence: Another set of participants had to count backward from 1,000 by nines as they watched the clips, <highlight>occupying</highlight> their conscious working memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一组参与者在观看视频时必须从1000到9倒着数，这占据了他们有意识的工作记忆。

examination_example.sentence: But just some 22, 000 birds remain today, <highlight>occupying</highlight> about 16% of the species' historic range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是今天只剩下大约22000只鸟，大约占据了这个物种历史范围的16%。

sense_info_list.en: take control of a place, especially a country by military conquest or settlement

examination_example.sentence: On the overturned provisions the majority held that Congress had deliberately "<highlight>occupied</highlight> the field".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在被推翻的规定中，多数人认为国会故意“占领了该领域”。

sense_info_list.en: fill or preoccupy the mind or thoughts

sample.mean: n. 时刻；场合；理由；原因；仪式；庆典；重大场合；适当时机
v. 发生；出现；存在；产生

拿, 抓, 握住(=take, hold, seize)

word_usage.usage: occupy表示“居住; 占用; 占据”时，为及物动词，可接名词或代词作宾语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 占有; 占用(空间或时间)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 全神贯注；入神；使人全神贯注的事物；使人入神的事物
adj. 全神贯注的；心事重重的；被先占的
v. 使全神贯注；使入神
n. 工作；职业；占领；占领期间；居住；使用；消遣

word_family.mean: v. 居住；占用；使（大脑；思绪）老想着；军事占领；占据；居；拥有；使忙碌；非法强占

sense_info_list.en: to fill, exist in, or use a place or period of time
sense_info_list.zh: 占有; 占用(空间或时间)

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, within minutes the fire <highlight>occupied</highlight> headlines of every major global newspaper and television network.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确实，几分钟之内，大火占据了全球各大报纸和电视网络的头条。

examination_example.sentence: If we're honest with ourselves, tech is just another way to <highlight>occupy</highlight> our time and minds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们对自己诚实，科技只是占据我们时间和思想的另一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: 2 percent of malls were full, or <highlight>occupied</highlight>, with shops by the end of 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到2014年底，2%的商场已满，或已被占用，商店林立。

sense_info_list.en: take control of a place, especially a country by military conquest or settlement

examination_example.sentence: Penguins, like other seabirds and marine mammals, <highlight>occupy</highlight> higher levels in the food chain and they are what we call bio-indicators of their ecosystems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企鹅与其他海鸟和海洋哺乳动物一样，在食物链中占据较高的位置，它们被称为其生态系统的生物指示器。

sense_info_list.en: reside or have one's place of business in a building
fill or preoccupy the mind or thoughts

examination_example.sentence: But keeping those foxes from harm will <highlight>occupy</highlight> Boser and her colleagues for years to come.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，让这些狐狸免受伤害将是Boser和她的同事们未来几年的工作。

sense_info_list.en: take control of a place; especially a country by military conquest or settlement

examination_example.sentence: People of two <highlight>occupy</highlight> a table for six.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两个人占用了一张六人桌。

examination_example.sentence: Like humans, killer whales have colonized a range of different habitats across the globe, <highlight>occupying</highlight> every ocean basin on the planet, with an empire that extends from pole to pole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像人类一样，虎鲸聚居于全球各不相同的栖息地，占据了地球上的每个海洋盆地，拥有从一极延伸到另一极的帝国。

sense_info_list.en: fill or preoccupy the mind or thoughts
reside or have one's place of business in a building

examination_example.sentence: Songdo's backers contend that it's still early, and business space is filling up-about 70 percent of finished offices are now <highlight>occupied</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 松岛的支持者认为，现在还为时过早，商业空间正在充实——目前已完工的办公楼入驻率约为70%。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It encourages us to <highlight>occupy</highlight> our own little corner, to avoid foolish leaps into the dark, to be satisfied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它鼓励我们占据自己的小角落，避免愚蠢地跳入黑暗，获得满足。
